entry.summary:

entry.title: LA Queer & Kinky Connections Spring Munch
entry.summary:
Author: isthatacatsherlock

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,386Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 8

Summary: “Oh, hi. Scott, this is Eddie.” Eddie shook his hand. “Eddie, Scott. Scott here invited me to his place.”“Oh, lucky. Well, have fun.”“Unless…you wanted to come with us?” Scott asked. That got an awkward laugh from Eddie.“Well I uh…um I just want to watch. I’m not ready for the next step yet.”“He’s my friend. We didn’t know …I didn’t know he knew about this place,” explained Buck.“And I didn’t know he came here,” explained Eddie.Scott was looking between them, figuring something out and not telling Buck what it was. Any impression of jealousy went away quick, though. “You should come. You can just watch if you want. You can join in, you can watch. Whatever you like. It’ll be fun!”

entry.title: Assured
entry.summary:
Author: cathcer1984

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 8,938Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 362

Summary: It’s clear that his mom doesn’t like it but before she can say anything, Buck's speaking again. “Chris asked me to come. If you could show me where he is?” She doesn’t move, just tips her head back to look up at Buck, stare him down. “Christopher needs his family.” “He needs his dad,” Eddie interjects, squeezing Buck’s fingers before letting go. There’s a smug look on his mom’s face, Adriana’s watching the three of them intensely but her hand curls around their mom’s arm. Helena says, “his dad was always here.” “I wasn’t talking about me,” Eddie replies firmly. ---Buck turns up in Texas when Chris and Eddie need him.

entry.summary:
Author: zanekeller

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,816Chapters: 1/13Kudos: 7

Summary: War wasn’t supposed to change anything. Buck came here to do a job—get in, get out, survive. He didn’t plan on meeting someone like Eddie Diaz.Somewhere between the dust and the gunfire, something shifts. And for the first time, Buck wonders if surviving means more than just making it out alive.***Or, Buck thought the only person he came here for was the man they sent him to save. Turns out, he was wrong.
